trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZD001_04225_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The state of affairs in this corner of the world has left many sick and hungry, Amanieu and his daughter not least among them.
TEXT_AKTKZD001_04225_TODO_00<tab>Obtain the buckwheat seeds from a container in the marketplace.
TEXT_AKTKZD001_04225_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the buckwheat seeds to Amanieu.

TEXT_AKTKZD001_04225_AMANIEU_000_000<tab>A moment, good <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((sir)) /var>, if you've one to spare. My daughter has taken ill with a menace of a cold. She can hardly keep even a bite of food down, though I know that a simple bowl of kasha will be easy on the stomach, and be enough to sustain her.

TEXT_AKTKZD001_04225_AMANIEU_000_001<tab>Unfortunately, I lack the buckwheat seeds the recipe calls for. The abandoned market ought to have what I require, but...I do not fancy my chances in a place so dangerous.

TEXT_AKTKZD001_04225_AMANIEU_000_002<tab>Besides, I dare not leave my girl alone for an extended period. This illness of hers waxes and wanes from moment to moment, and the last thing I want is to be away when her fever spikes or a coughing fit assails her. Please, could you help?

TEXT_AKTKZD001_04225_AMANIEU_000_003<tab>You will? Oh, you are a merciful, kind soul! Here, I shall mark on your map where the seeds are like to be found. Giving the containers a thorough once-over should soon yield results.

TEXT_AKTKZD001_04225_AMANIEU_000_004<tab>Though the market is not the only place to find the seeds I need to make kasha, I would recommend inspecting the containers there first before expanding your search.
TEXT_AKTKZD001_04225_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>You are met with a congeries of seeds. Some are too soft, some too hard, but these seem <var 1A 02 /var>just<var 1A 01 /var> right.
TEXT_AKTKZD001_04225_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>Alack, there appears to be no sign of the seeds, but you did come across a box of medical supplies.
TEXT_AKTKZD001_04225_Q1_000_000<tab>Would you like to bring these supplies back to the man and his sick daughter?
TEXT_AKTKZD001_04225_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>There is no sign of any seeds in the area. However, during your search, you stumble upon a stuffed toy bear.
TEXT_AKTKZD001_04225_Q2_000_000<tab>Would you like to bring the toy back to Amanieu and his sick daughter?
TEXT_AKTKZD001_04225_AMANIEU_000_040<tab>There you are! And none the worse for wear. Oh, that look on your face─I take it to mean you've found the seeds, then?
TEXT_AKTKZD001_04225_AMANIEU_000_050<tab>You have! How wonderful! This ought to brighten my daughter's spirits─and hopefully entice her to put a bit of food in her belly.
TEXT_AKTKZD001_04225_AMANIEU_000_060<tab>Why, look at all you have brought. Medicine? A toy bear? But I did not even ask, and yet... Goodness, I'm so touched. You are too kind, truly.

TEXT_AKTKZD001_04225_AMANIEU_000_061<tab>My life lately─if one can even call it that─has been consumed by concern. Concern for my daughter's safety, where our next meal will come from... But your good deed today was a bright spot in these bleak times.
TEXT_AKTKZD001_04225_AMANIEU_000_070<tab>What is this? Medical supplies? And it even contains a simple cold remedy. This is too wonderful to be believed!
TEXT_AKTKZD001_04225_AMANIEU_000_080<tab>What have we here? A toy bear? This will do wonders to buoy my daughter's flagging spirits. How considerate you are to think of her so.

TEXT_AKTKZD001_04225_AMANIEU_000_090<tab>To tell the truth, you are not the first to show us unexpected compassion. Being from the provinces, I feared the Garleans here would turn us away, but they offered us food and shelter. If it weren't for them, we may not be alive today.

TEXT_AKTKZD001_04225_AMANIEU_000_091<tab>And now we owe a debt of gratitude to you and your contingent. Thanks to you, my daughter will grow strong again, of this I'm sure. While I can't offer much, I want you to have this. And I will not take no for an answer!
